oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Big Ridge Park a great place for outdoor sports on Norris Lake, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color image of people boating on Norris Lake at Big Ridge State Park. Features a white border and divided back. Postcard printed on linen. [No. N-710] [No. E-6697] Note: this is an additional copy of this postcard and is the same as 48787.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Big Ridge State Park (Tenn.); Maynardville (Tenn.); Union County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: State parks & reserves; Recreation; Lakes & ponds; Boats; People; Trees
